# Heimdall-Apps

Fulfilling a foundation app request

[![Fulfilling an app request](https://i.imgur.com/d4x91Bj.gif)](https://youtu.be/tDHxSOWqOBQ)

[Check out the Wiki](https://github.com/linuxserver/Heimdall-Apps/wiki) for more details on submitting apps.

[![enhancedapps](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json.svg?label=Enhanced%20Apps&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.heimdall.site%2Fstats&query=enhanced_apps&colorB=3f8483&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://apps.heimdall.site/applications/enhanced)
